entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Whistler
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Whistler 8:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 56 %
Dewpoint: -17.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm except 10 cm near Pemberton. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
